document.full_text: rod stewart would rather play with his toy trains than write a hit song, but his domestic distractions did not prevent him from getting a top songwriters' award in hollywood on wednesday.
document.title: reluctant songwriter rod stewart honored in hollywood
lines_and_colors: rod stewart would rather play with his toy trains than write a hit song, but his domestic distractions did not prevent him from getting a top songwriters' award in hollywood on wednesday.
